title: DO-00-030: Diversified and Sector Mutual Funds
summary:
OGE provides guidance on the distinction between diversified and sector mutual funds for purposes of certain regulatory exemptions, codified in 5 C.F.R. part 2640.  

Notes: [The guidance in this advisory regarding real estate funds was amended by Legal Advisory LA-15-09. The guidance regarding funds invested in internet, computer, and information technology companies was amended by Legal Advisory LA-19-06.]
